sentences.sentence: Conditions associated with mucosal atrophy include iron deficiency, some vitamin deficiencies, and sideropenic dysphagia.
sentences.translation: 与粘膜萎缩相关的症状包括缺铁、某些维生素缺乏和缺铁性吞咽困难。

sentences.sentence: Cardiac orifice mucosal laceration and oozing of blood were 73.9%, but without perforation and massive hemorrhage.
sentences.translation: 贲门黏膜撕裂、渗血占73.9%，但无穿孔和大出血。

sentences.sentence: Early initiation of highly active anti-retroviral therapy - HAART - was another factor that appeared to prevent inflammation and better enable the gut mucosal immune system to do its job.
sentences.translation: 及早采用高效抗逆转录病毒疗法是能够预防发炎并加强肠道黏膜免疫功能的另一个手段。
